name: Microsoft Azure Compute
description: This app implements virtualization actions for Microsoft Azure Virtual Machines

client_id.description: Application (client) ID assigned to your Azure Compute app

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Generates a token
actions.verbose: This action generated a new token whenever any action fails because of an invalid or expired token.

actions.description: Get information about a VM

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group

vm_name.description: The name of the virtual machine

example_values: The system info was successfully retrieved

actions.description: Get the list of registered VMs

actions.verbose: While creating a snapshot using the COPY option, 'source_resource_id' parameter is required and while using the IMPORT option, 'source_uri' parameter is required. For the 'source_uri' parameter, the uri value should be valid page blob uri path. For more information refer to API Docs.
actions.description: Take a snapshot of the VM

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group

snapshot_name.description: The name of the snapshot that is being created. The name can't be changed after the snapshot is created. Supported characters for the name are a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and _. The max name length is 80 characters

source_resource_id.description: If create_option is Copy, this is the ARM ID of the source snapshot or disk

source_uri.description: If create_option is Import, this is the URI of a blob to be imported into a managed disk

example_values: Status: Successfully created snapshot, Provisioning state: Updating

actions.description: Start a stopped or suspended VM

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group

vm_name.description: The name of the virtual machine

actions.description: Stop a VM

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group

vm_name.description: The name of the virtual machine

actions.description: Delete a VM

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group

vm_name.description: The name of the virtual machine

actions.description: Shut down the virtual machine and release the compute resources. You are not billed for the compute resource that this virtual machine uses

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group

vm_name.description: The name of the virtual machine

actions.description: Get the names and values of all resource tags that are defined in the subscription
Create or update a tag

tag_value.description: The value of the tag to create or update

actions.description: Get the list of resource groups for the subscription
Get the list of snapshots under the subscription

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group

actions.description: Get the list of all security groups in a resource group
actions.verbose: API limitation: Network Security Group (classic) is not part of the response.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group

group_type.description: Type of security group to query

example_values: Allow inbound traffic from all VMs in VNET

actions.description: Add a network security group in a resource group
actions.verbose: The 'security_rules' parameter accept JSON format value. For non-JSON values, the parameter values will be ignored. Refer to API Docs for more information on adding a network security group.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group

group_name.description: Name of security group to add

default_security_rules.description: Comma separated list of default security rules for the network security group

provisioning_state.description: The provisioning state of the public IP resource

resource_guid.description: The resource GUID property of the network security group resource

security_rules.description: Comma separated list of security rules of the network security group

example_values: Allow inbound traffic from all VMs in VNET
Status: Successfully added or updated security group
Successfully added or updated security group

actions.description: Add an application security groups in a resource group

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group

group_name.description: Name of security group to add

tags.description: String object of resource tags. It should be in JSON format

example_values: Status: Successfully added or updated security group
Successfully added or updated security group

actions.description: Get the list of virtual networks

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group

actions.description: Get the list of subnets

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group

virtual_network_name.description: The name of the virtual network

actions.description: Check if a private IP address is available for use

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group

virtual_network_name.description: The name of the virtual network

ip_address.description: The private IP address to be verified

actions.description: Set the state of the virtual machine to be generalized

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group

vm_name.description: The name of the virtual machine

actions.description: Redeploy a virtual machine

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group

vm_name.description: The name of the virtual machine

actions.description: Run a command on the virtual machine
actions.verbose: Run a command or a script in an Azure Windows or Linux VM. Refer to API Docs for more information.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group

vm_name.description: The name of the virtual machine

command_id.description: The command to run against the VM

script.description: The script to be executed. When this value is given, the given script will override the default script of the command

actions.description: Fetch the results of a previously executed run_command action
actions.verbose: Commands in Azure can take up to 90 minutes to execute. This allows you to retrieve results of previously executed actions. Refer to API Docs for more information.

results_url.description: The name of the resource group
